title: Gratin dauphinoise
description: AWT explains how to cook dauphinoise potatoes in five easy steps. The secret is patience.
tips: Sprinkle grated cheese over the top of your potato gratin before cooking for an extra treat.

default: 450g/1lb waxy potatoes, thinly sliced (such as Desirée, Golden Wonder or King Edward)
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Rub a gratin dish liberally with the garlic and butter.
Layer the potatoes into the dish, making sure each layer is seasoned.
Pour over the cream and cook in the oven for 1¼ hours.
Turn up the heat to 200C/400F/Gas 6 and cook for a further 15 minutes until the top is golden. Serve.
